mapper.select: SELECT `user`.`password` , `user`.userid , '1' usertype , `user`.acctoken , `user`.accestoken from `user` INNER JOIN landlord on `user`.userid = landlord.landuserid where `user`.telephone = #{telephone}

SELECT `user`.`password` , `user`.userid , '2' usertype , `user`.acctoken , `user`.accestoken from `user` INNER JOIN landlord_manager on `user`.userid = landlord_manager.manageruserid where `user`.telephone = #{telephone}
